00051 MeshUtil::~MeshUtil() { delete globalPatch; }
00052 
00053 PatchData* MeshUtil::get_global_patch( MsqError& err ) 
00054 {
00055   if (!globalPatch) {
00056     globalPatch = new PatchData;
00057     globalPatch->set_mesh( myMesh );
00058     if (mySettings)
00059       globalPatch->attach_settings( mySettings );
00060     globalPatch->fill_global_patch( err );
00061     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) {
00062       delete globalPatch;
00063       globalPatch = 0;
00064     }
00065   }
00066   return globalPatch;
00067 }
00068 
00069 void MeshUtil::edge_length_distribution( SimpleStats& results, MsqError& err )
00070 {
00071   PatchData* pd = get_global_patch(err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00072   EdgeIterator iter(pd, err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00073   while (!iter.is_at_end()) {
00074     Vector3D diff = iter.start() - iter.end();
00075     results.add_squared( diff % diff );
00076     iter.step( err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00077   }
00078  
00079   if (results.empty()) { // no mesh
00080     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Mesh contains no elements", MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00081   }
00082 }
00083 
00084 void MeshUtil::lambda_distribution( SimpleStats& results, MsqError& err )
00085 {
00086   PatchData& pd = *get_global_patch(err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00087   
00088   std::vector<size_t> handles;
00089   TMPQualityMetric::get_patch_evaluations( pd, handles, false, err );
00090   
00091   const size_t N = 64;
00092   size_t count;
00093   size_t indices[N];
00094   MsqVector<2> derivs2D[N];
00095   MsqVector<3> derivs3D[N];
00096   
00097   for (size_t i = 0; i < handles.size(); ++i) {
00098     double lambda;
00099     const Sample s = ElemSampleQM::sample( handles[i] );
00100     const size_t e = ElemSampleQM::  elem( handles[i] );
00101     EntityTopology type = pd.element_by_index(e).get_element_type();
00102     const NodeSet bits = pd.non_slave_node_set( e );
00103 
00104     if (TopologyInfo::dimension( type ) == 3)
00105     {
00106       const MappingFunction3D* mf = pd.get_mapping_function_3D( type );
00107       if (!mf) {
00108         MSQ_SETERR(err)( "No mapping function for element type", MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00109         return;
00110       }
00111       
00112       MsqMatrix<3,3> W;
00113       mf->jacobian( pd, e, bits, s, indices, derivs3D, count, W, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00114       assert(N >= count);
00115       lambda = TargetCalculator::size( W );
00116     }
00117     else 
00118     {
00119       assert( TopologyInfo::dimension( type ) == 2 );
00120       const MappingFunction2D* mf = pd.get_mapping_function_2D( type );
00121       if (!mf) {
00122         MSQ_SETERR(err)( "No mapping function for element type", MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00123         return;
00124       }
00125       
00126       MsqMatrix<3,2> W;
00127       mf->jacobian( pd, e, bits, s, indices, derivs2D, count, W, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00128       assert(N >= count);
00129       lambda = TargetCalculator::size( W );
00130     }
00131 
00132     results.add_value( lambda );
00133   }
00134   
00135   if (results.empty()) { // no mesh
00136     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Mesh contains no elements", MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00137   }
00138 }

00140 bool MeshUtil::meshes_are_different(Mesh& mesh1, Mesh& mesh2, MsqError& err, double tol, bool do_print )
00141 {
00142   //MsqError& err = (do_print ? MsqPrintError(cout) : MsqError());
00143     
00144   // mesh 1
00145   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> elements1;
00146   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vertices1;
00147   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> connectivity1;
00148   std::vector<size_t> offsets1;                                                                                      
00149 
00150   mesh1.get_all_elements(elements1, err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00151   mesh1.get_all_vertices(vertices1, err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00152   mesh1.elements_get_attached_vertices( arrptr(elements1), elements1.size(),
00153                                         connectivity1, offsets1, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00154   std::vector<EntityTopology> types1(elements1.size());
00155   mesh1.elements_get_topologies( arrptr(elements1), arrptr(types1), elements1.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00156 
00157   // mesh 2
00158   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> elements2;
00159   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> vertices2;
00160   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> connectivity2;
00161   std::vector<size_t> offsets2;                                                                                      
00162 
00163   mesh2.get_all_elements(elements2, err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00164   mesh2.get_all_vertices(vertices2, err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00165   mesh2.elements_get_attached_vertices( arrptr(elements2), elements2.size(),
00166                                         connectivity2, offsets2, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00167   std::vector<EntityTopology> types2(elements2.size());
00168   mesh2.elements_get_topologies( arrptr(elements2), arrptr(types2), elements2.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00169 
00170 #define MDRET(msg) do { if (do_print) std::cout << "MeshUtil::mesh_diff meshes are different: " << msg << std::endl; return true; } while(0)
00171   if (elements1.size() != elements2.size()) MDRET("elements sizes differ");
00172   if (vertices1.size() != vertices2.size()) MDRET("vertices sizes differ");
00173   if (offsets1.size() != offsets2.size()) MDRET("offsets sizes differ");
00174   if (connectivity1.size() != connectivity2.size()) MDRET("connectivity sizes differ");
00175 
00176   for (unsigned i=0; i < offsets1.size(); i++)
00177     {
00178       if (offsets1[i] != offsets2[i]) MDRET("offets differ");
00179     }
00180 
00181   for (unsigned i=0; i < vertices1.size(); i++)
00182     {
00183       MsqVertex vert1, vert2;
00184       mesh1.vertices_get_coordinates( &vertices1[i], &vert1, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00185       mesh2.vertices_get_coordinates( &vertices2[i], &vert2, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00186       double dist = Vector3D::distance_between(vert1, vert2);
00187       double v1 = vert1.length();
00188       double v2 = vert2.length();
00189       if ( dist > 0.5*(v1+v2)*tol ) {
00190         std::ostringstream ost;
00191         ost << "vertices coordinates differ more than tolerance [" << tol << "], vert1= " << vert1 << " vert2= " << vert2;
00192         MDRET(ost.str());
00193       }
00194     }
00195 
00196   for (unsigned i=0; i < connectivity1.size(); i++)
00197     {
00198       MsqVertex vert1, vert2;
00199       mesh1.vertices_get_coordinates( &connectivity1[i], &vert1, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00200       mesh2.vertices_get_coordinates( &connectivity2[i], &vert2, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00201       double dist = Vector3D::distance_between(vert1, vert2);
00202       double v1 = vert1.length();
00203       double v2 = vert2.length();
00204       if ( dist > 0.5*(v1+v2)*tol ) {
00205         std::ostringstream ost;
00206         ost << "connectivity coordinates differ more than tolerance [" << tol << "], vert1= " << vert1 << " vert2= " << vert2;
00207         MDRET(ost.str());
00208       }
00209     }
00210 
00211   return false;
00212 }
